response.summary: Chemical Engineer, Master's in Environmental Engineering Applications. Experience in research, development, and innovation projects, water treatment by membrane systems, physicochemical analysis, laboratory procedures, protocol elaboration, training, and project coordination. Knowledge of laboratory techniques, water treatment, desalination, waste management technologies, and project management. Interest in areas of research, water treatment, project management, chemical processes, control, and quality management.
response.skills: Spectroscopy, Laboratory Equipment, UV/Vis Spectroscopy, Titration, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, NIR Spectroscopy, Chemical Handling, Computer Literacy, Chemical Testing, Quality Control, Teamwork, Logistics Management, Organization Skills, Analytical Chemistry, Team Management, Project Management, Analytical Skills, Communication, Project Coordination

profile_positions.description:
Project “Science Up, Promoting Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Technology Transfer Capacities for the Country’s Development (Consortium Ciencia 2030)” 

Responsibilities:

• Implementation of a strategic development plan in science faculties to promote innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology transfer in science faculties at the Catholic University of the North.
• Coordination of the project activities, monitoring and updating indicators and the achievement of objectives. Attending and organising meetings, solving problems, and responding to queries related to programs and activities. Consolidation of unit reports on innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology transfer issues.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project “Fondef Idea: Development of an Advanced Oxidation Process Combined with Ultrasound to Recycle Reverse Osmosis Membranes into Filtration Membranes for Tertiary Wastewater Treatment”

Responsibilities:

• Development of a process to recycle reverse osmosis membranes at the laboratory scale and laboratory protocols and procedures for water and membrane filtration analysis.
• Quotation and purchase of supplies and equipment for the implementation of the new laboratory.
• Operation of laboratory equipment such as ozone generator, ultrasonic bath, spectrophotometer, turbidimeter and ph-meter. 
• Design and validation of Membrane Bioreactor using recycled membranes.
profile_positions.title: Scientific Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Project “Science Up, Promoting Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Technology Transfer Capacities for the Country’s Development (Consortium Ciencia 2030)”

Responsibilities:

• Elaboration of diagnostic reports of the units concerning innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology transfer issues. Information gathering and indicators for the design of the strategy to be implemented.
• Coordination the activities of the Directorate, organising meetings, solving problems, and responding to queries related to programs and activities.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project “FIC: Water Treatment Plant to Improve the Productivity of the Pica Lemon Crop”

Responsibilities: 

• Management, execution and coordination of the design, construction and implementation of a water treatment plant using reverse osmosis and ion exchange technologies.
• Conducting field and laboratory experiments, tests and analyses and collecting information and samples. Installation and commissioning of a mobile reverse osmosis and ion exchange water treatment plant. Presenting results and reports in graphic and written form.
• Preparation of the operating manual for the water treatment plant and training personnel to manage the water treatment plant under safe conditions and monitor operating parameters.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for laboratory practices for the Diploma in Water Desalination Technologies at Desert Water Technology Research Centre (Ceitsaza)
profile_positions.title: Laboratory Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Project “Development of a Strategic Plan of the PUCV-USACH-UCN Consortium to foster capacities for technology transfer, innovation and entrepreneurship to careers and undergraduate and postgraduate science-based programmes (Consortium Ciencia 2030)”

Responsibilities: 

• Technical execution and coordination of activities to develop a Strategic Plan in Science Faculties at the Catholic University of the North. 
• Participation in the generation of a Strategic Plan to include entrepreneurship, innovation and transfer technology topics in the courses and programmes of the science faculties.
• Preparation of diagnostic reports of the units concerning innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology transfer issues.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Desert Water Technology Research Centre (Ceitsaza)

Responsibilities: 

• Design a Massive Open Online Course on Membrane Desalination Technologies and support in the formulation of applied research projects. Preparation of training material and updating of the platform of online education. Constant communication with students via online study platform, review of feedback and answering queries.
• Development of laboratory protocols and procedures for the analysis of reverse osmosis membranes using membrane autopsy techniques and operation of laboratory equipment such as ICP, fluorescence microscopy and spectrophotometer.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Support in the preparation of formulations for household cleaning products.
Responsible for sampling and physicochemical analysis of raw materials and finished products for approval, use and dispatch.
In charge of inspection and approval of labels and packaging material.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Assistant

profile_positions.description: Responsible for standardising the ASTM D240 calorimetry test for liquid hydrocarbons in the thermodynamics laboratory of the National University of Colombia, Bogotá.
profile_positions.title: Laboratory Analyst

profile_positions.description: Manage the Chemical and Environmental Engineering Department's programme of technical visits for students in their final semesters. Contact companies in the chemical sector to receive students as visitors and draw up the schedule of the visits, ensuring the attendance of all the companies contacted.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant
